Module com.gluonhq.richtextarea

Package com.gluonhq.richtextarea.model

package com.gluonhq.richtextarea.model
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.gluonhq.richtextarea
     
    com.gluonhq.richtextarea.action
     
    com.gluonhq.richtextarea.undo

  • Class
    Description
    AbstractTextBuffer
     
    Block
     
    BlockUnit
    Block is an unbreakable object that can be added to the PieceTable
    Decoration
    Interface used to define the decoration applied to a fragment of RichTextArea Known implementations: TextDecoration and ImageDecoration for text decoration, and ParagraphDecoration for paragraph decoration
    DecorationModel
    A DecorationModel contains the text and paragraph decorations for a fragment of text, defined by a start position and a length.
    Document
    A Document is the basic model that contains all the information required for the RichTextArea control, in order to render all the rich content, including decorated text, images and other non-text objects.
    EmojiUnit
    Emoji object that can be added to the PieceTable
    ImageDecoration
    ImageDecoration is a Decoration that can be applied to a fragment of text in order to place an image at its location.
    ImageUnit
    Image object that can be added to the PieceTable
    Paragraph
     
    ParagraphDecoration
    ParagraphDecoration is a Decoration that can be applied to a fragment of text in order to style the paragraph that contains such fragment.
    ParagraphDecoration.Builder
     
    ParagraphDecoration.GraphicType
    The type of graphic applied to the left of the paragraph
    Piece
     
    Piece.BufferType
     
    PieceTable
    Piece table implementation.
    More info at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piece_table
    Table
    Table is a Paragraph with a single text string that contains zero width separators to indicate the cell separation, ending with an end of line character "\n".
    TableDecoration
    TableDecoration is a Decoration that can be applied to a paragraph in order to place a table with a number of rows and columns where text can be added, with a given text alignment defined per table cell.
    TextBuffer
     
    TextBuffer.DecorateEvent
     
    TextBuffer.DeleteEvent
     
    TextBuffer.Event
     
    TextBuffer.InsertEvent
     
    TextDecoration
    TextDecoration is a Decoration that can be applied to a fragment of text in order to generate rich text, that is, styled text with different text attributes like color of font.
    TextDecoration.Builder
     
    TextUnit
    String object that can be added to the PieceTable
    Unit
    Defines an object that can be inserted into a PieceTable.
    UnitBuffer
    A UnitBuffer is a collection of units and related operations, like getting their internal or exportable text.
